OpenAI reportedly utilized Claude's coding capabilities to aid in the development of its upcoming GPT-5 model, specifically for benchmarking and safety evaluations. This decision reflects growing tensions within the AI industry, as companies increasingly restrict competitor access to their APIs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/explosive-usage-anthropic-revokes-chatgpt-maker-openais-access-to-claude-says-openais-technical-staff-were-using-our-coding-tools-to/articleshow/123073829.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/explosive-usage-anthropic-revokes-chatgpt-maker-openais-access-to-claude-says-openais-technical-staff-were-using-our-coding-tools-to/articleshow/123073829.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 13:53:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="85740" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073843,imgsize-85740.cms"/></item><item><title>'I was a baby' – Gavaskar declares Gill’s 754 more valuable than his 774 -Watch</title><description><![CDATA[Sunil Gavaskar lauded Shubman Gill's impressive 754 runs, acknowledging it surpassed his own achievements. Gavaskar presented Gill with a special shirt and autographed cap. The event followed Gill's tactical brilliance with Mohammed Siraj, dismissing Zak Crawley. Gavaskar also reminisced about his lucky jacket from the Gabba Test.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/i-was-a-baby-gill-is-a-leader-sunil-gavaskar-declares-shubmans-754-more-valuable-than-his-own-774/articleshow/123074038.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/i-was-a-baby-gill-is-a-leader-sunil-gavaskar-declares-shubmans-754-more-valuable-than-his-own-774/articleshow/123074038.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 14:17:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50358" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123074060,imgsize-50358.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Happen in Lagaan…’: Trump sees Pak selling oil to India! Reality of their reserves</title><description><![CDATA[Harsh Goenka mocked Donald Trump's suggestion of Pakistan selling oil to India, deeming it highly improbable. Trump claimed a deal with Pakistan to develop its 'massive' oil reserves, potentially leading to sales to India. However, Pakistan's proven reserves are significantly smaller than India's, and it heavily relies on oil imports, making Trump's scenario unlikely.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/more-likely-to-happen-in-lagaan-than-harsh-goenka-mocks-trumps-pakistan-may-sell-oil-to-india-suggestion-heres-the-reality-of-paks-massive-reserves/articleshow/123073594.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/more-likely-to-happen-in-lagaan-than-harsh-goenka-mocks-trumps-pakistan-may-sell-oil-to-india-suggestion-heres-the-reality-of-paks-massive-reserves/articleshow/123073594.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 13:52:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="99640" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073845,imgsize-99640.cms"/></item><item><title>Malegaon blast case: Key docs mysteriously vanished; original statements of witnesses lost</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/key-documents-went-missing-original-statements-were-lost/articleshow/123067184.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/key-documents-went-missing-original-statements-were-lost/articleshow/123067184.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 03:44:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>REBECCA SAMERVEL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="916857" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123069198,imgsize-916857.cms"/></item><item><title>Grow a Garden trading and cooking event: Full guide to recipes, rewards, & new features</title><description><![CDATA[Roblox's Grow a Garden has launched its Trading and Cooking Event Update, introducing a fully interactive cooking system and a new trading mechanism. Players can now prepare dishes using harvested crops and trade items more efficiently to unlock rare in-game rewards. The update also includes exclusive cosmetics and unique pets, enhancing the game’s farming-simulation experience.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/gaming/grow-a-garden-trading-and-cooking-event-update-full-guide-to-recipes-rewards-and-new-features/articleshow/123072402.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/gaming/grow-a-garden-trading-and-cooking-event-update-full-guide-to-recipes-rewards-and-new-features/articleshow/123072402.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 11:20:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57200" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123072411,imgsize-57200.cms"/></item><item><title>Granite quarry collapse: 6 workers dead, 10 injured in Andhra; rescue ops on</title><description><![CDATA[A devastating rockslide at a granite quarry in Bapatla district claimed the lives of six workers and left ten others seriously injured. The incident occurred at the Satyakrishna Granite Quarry near Ballikurava, trapping workers under a collapsed portion of rocks. Rescue operations are underway to recover the remaining bodies, while the injured receive treatment at Narasaraopet Government Hospital.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/vijayawada/granite-quarry-collapse-6-workers-dead-10-injured-in-andhra-pradeshs-bapatla-rescue-ops-on/articleshow/123073623.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/vijayawada/granite-quarry-collapse-6-workers-dead-10-injured-in-andhra-pradeshs-bapatla-rescue-ops-on/articleshow/123073623.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 13:43:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>MADHU RASALA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="298497" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073726,imgsize-298497.cms"/></item><item><title>Last seen at Burger King: Four Indian-origin family members missing in US</title><description><![CDATA[An Indian-origin family of four, travelling from Buffalo to Pittsburgh, has gone missing, prompting a search operation. Asha, Kishore, Shailesh, and Gita Divan were headed to West Virginia after stopping at a Burger King in Erie, Pennsylvania. Their cell phones are unanswered since Tuesday, and they never checked into their pre-booked lodging.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/last-seen-at-burger-king-four-indian-origin-family-members-missing-in-us-were-en-route-to-temple/articleshow/123073336.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/last-seen-at-burger-king-four-indian-origin-family-members-missing-in-us-were-en-route-to-temple/articleshow/123073336.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 12:56:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1347464" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073338,imgsize-1347464.cms"/></item><item><title>Himachal monsoon havoc: 173 dead, highways shut; IMD warns of more rainfall</title><description><![CDATA[Himachal Pradesh is reeling from relentless rain, resulting in blocked roads, power outages, and disrupted water supplies, with Chamba, Kullu, Mandi, and Una being the worst-hit districts. The monsoon season has claimed 173 lives, with a significant number attributed to landslides and flash floods.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/shimla/himachal-pradesh-monsoon-havoc-173-dead-highways-shut-dam-collapses-imd-warns-of-more-rain/articleshow/123072694.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/shimla/himachal-pradesh-monsoon-havoc-173-dead-highways-shut-dam-collapses-imd-warns-of-more-rain/articleshow/123072694.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 11:59:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="212160" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123072690,imgsize-212160.cms"/></item><item><title>Mark Zuckerberg meets 24-yr-old AI researcher who rejected Meta's $125m job offer</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's aggressive pursuit of AI dominance led them to recruit 24-year-old Matt Deitke, initially offering $125 million, which he declined. Zuckerberg's personal intervention resulted in a revised $250 million package, including potential $100 million in the first year. Deitke, known for his work on Molmo and founding Vercept, is a highly sought-after AI talent.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 12:36:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123058081,imgsize-23578.cms"/></item><item><title>Meet Arvinder Singh Bahal: 80-yr-old space tourist on Blue Origin flight; launching August 3</title><description><![CDATA[Agra's 80-year-old Arvinder Singh Bahal, a seasoned traveler, is set to embark on Blue Origin's New Shepard NS-34 mission on August 3, 2025. Having explored all 196 countries, Bahal's space journey symbolizes his lifelong curiosity. Blue Origin's suborbital flight will take Bahal and other passengers beyond Earth's atmosphere from West Texas.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/who-is-arvinder-singh-bahal-the-80-year-old-adventurer-flying-to-space-aboard-jeff-bezos-blue-origin-mission-on-august-3/articleshow/123073007.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/who-is-arvinder-singh-bahal-the-80-year-old-adventurer-flying-to-space-aboard-jeff-bezos-blue-origin-mission-on-august-3/articleshow/123073007.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 12:33:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38828" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073079,imgsize-38828.cms"/></item><item><title>Vaughan slams Pietersen: 'He’s talking nonsense' - all you need to know</title><description><![CDATA[A social media clash erupted after Kevin Pietersen claimed Test batting was tougher 20 years ago, listing legendary bowlers and challenging fans to name modern equivalents. Michael Vaughan countered, asserting current bowlers are equally skilled. He highlighted India's seamers, Australia's trio, and South Africa's Rabada and Jansen, praising the competitiveness of recent Test cricket and the quality of today's bowlers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/michael-vaughan-slams-compatriot-kevin-pietersen-i-think-hes-talking-nonsense-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123073747.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/michael-vaughan-slams-compatriot-kevin-pietersen-i-think-hes-talking-nonsense-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123073747.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 13:58:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39704" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073874,imgsize-39704.cms"/></item><item><title>'Let departed rest in peace': BJP fumes over Rahul's Jaitley 'threatened' him claim</title><description><![CDATA[Rahul Gandhi's claim that Arun Jaitley threatened him over farm laws has sparked controversy, drawing strong condemnation from BJP leaders and Jaitley's son, Rohan. They refuted the claim, citing Jaitley's death in 2019, before the laws were introduced. Critics accuse Gandhi of making baseless allegations and disrespecting the deceased leader.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/let-departed-rest-in-peace-bjp-slams-rahul-gandhi-over-arun-jaitley-threatened-him-claim-rijiju-asks-how-much-can-one-lie/articleshow/123072275.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/let-departed-rest-in-peace-bjp-slams-rahul-gandhi-over-arun-jaitley-threatened-him-claim-rijiju-asks-how-much-can-one-lie/articleshow/123072275.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 11:17:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1118808" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123072379,imgsize-1118808.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Sundar Pichai gets taste of something new during IND vs ENG 5th Test</title><description><![CDATA[During the fifth Test between India and England, Google CEO Sundar Pichai surprised fans by joining the commentary box alongside Harsha Bhogle. Pichai shared his childhood cricket memories and admiration for Gavaskar and Sachin. Coincidentally, Washington Sundar's counterattack coincided with Pichai's commentary, adding a delightful twist to the day's events. He also predicted a 2-2 series tie.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-sundar-pichai-gets-taste-of-something-new-during-ind-vs-eng-5th-test/articleshow/123072985.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-sundar-pichai-gets-taste-of-something-new-during-ind-vs-eng-5th-test/articleshow/123072985.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 12:56:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="80478" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073308,imgsize-80478.cms"/></item><item><title>Happy Friendship Day 2025: Best Messages, quotes, wishes, greetings card to share on Friendship Day</title><description><![CDATA[Friendship Day 2025 is approaching, offering a chance to strengthen bonds with cherished friends. From sharing nostalgic photos to planning themed parties or virtual meetups, the focus remains on appreciating the invaluable role friends play in life's journey.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-friendship-day-2025-best-messages-quotes-wishes-greetings-gifs-whatsapp-status-and-images-to-share-on-friendship-day/articleshow/123041197.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-friendship-day-2025-best-messages-quotes-wishes-greetings-gifs-whatsapp-status-and-images-to-share-on-friendship-day/articleshow/123041197.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 15:37:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50394" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123041222,imgsize-50394.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: 41-yo ABD flaunts his 'aura' in viral celebration after WCL 2025 title</title><description><![CDATA[AB de Villiers, at 41, showcased his enduring brilliance by scoring a match-winning century in the World Championship of Legends final, leading South Africa Champions to victory over Pakistan Champions. Following the win, de Villiers joined Wayne Parnell in recreating the viral "aura farming" dance, delighting fans.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-41-year-old-ab-de-villiers-flaunts-his-aura-in-viral-celebration-after-wcl-2025-title/articleshow/123073547.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-41-year-old-ab-de-villiers-flaunts-his-aura-in-viral-celebration-after-wcl-2025-title/articleshow/123073547.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 13:24:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="26512" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073585,imgsize-26512.cms"/></item><item><title>Guns, Jeans, and Republican: How Sydney Sweeney became MAGA's new muse</title><description><![CDATA[In an era where even a sneeze can be interpreted as a political statement, Sydney Sweeney has become the conservative darling of the year—without attending a single rally or issuing a single press release. The star of Euphoria and The White Lotus has, quite by accident, become a MAGA icon. All it took was a leaked Republican voter registration, a denim ad campaign misread as a white supremacist dog whistle, and a shooting range video that could’ve doubled as NRA propaganda. Welcome to 2025, where political identity is crafted less by what you say, and more by which side claims you.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/sydney-sweeney-maga-trump-jd-vance-republican/articleshow/123072638.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/sydney-sweeney-maga-trump-jd-vance-republican/articleshow/123072638.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 12:03:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2694029" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123072638,imgsize-2694029.cms"/></item><item><title>Earthquake hits New Jersey; tremors felt across parts of New York </title><description><![CDATA[A magnitude 3.0 earthquake rattled parts of New Jersey and New York on Saturday night, with the epicenter near Hasbrouck Heights, New Jersey. Tremors were felt across New York City and northern New Jersey, causing brief but intense jolts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/earthquake-hits-new-jersey-tremors-felt-across-parts-of-new-york-what-we-know-so-far/articleshow/123071205.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/earthquake-hits-new-jersey-tremors-felt-across-parts-of-new-york-what-we-know-so-far/articleshow/123071205.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 08:44:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30118" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123071268,imgsize-30118.cms"/></item><item><title>Chhattisgarh: 78 kids served mid-day meal partially eaten by stray dog</title><description><![CDATA[In Chhattisgarh's Balodabazar district, 78 students received anti-rabies vaccines after allegedly consuming mid-day meals contaminated by a stray dog. Gavaskar presented the gifts to encourage Gill to aim for the record in future series.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-sunil-gavaskar-surprises-shubman-gill-with-a-thoughtful-gift-and-a-promise-watch-the-wholesome-moment/articleshow/123070996.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-sunil-gavaskar-surprises-shubman-gill-with-a-thoughtful-gift-and-a-promise-watch-the-wholesome-moment/articleshow/123070996.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 07:50:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="97366" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123071012,imgsize-97366.cms"/></item><item><title>Dive into the deep: Life found 31,000 feet below ocean; creatures thrive without sunlight</title><description><![CDATA[Scientists discovered deep-sea life in the Pacific Ocean. The ecosystems exist over 31,000 feet below. These organisms survive without sunlight. Chemosynthesis provides energy for life. The Fendouzhe submersible aided the research. The discovery challenges previous biological limits. It reveals life's adaptability in extreme conditions. Researchers documented unique creatures like tube worms. This offers insights into Earth's mysterious habitats.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/life-found-31000-feet-below-the-ocean-a-hidden-world-of-deep-sea-creatures-thrives-without-sunlight/articleshow/123065077.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/life-found-31000-feet-below-the-ocean-a-hidden-world-of-deep-sea-creatures-thrives-without-sunlight/articleshow/123065077.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 07:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34540" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123067108,imgsize-34540.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University.       <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK.     <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
